execution.shell:
#!/bin/bash
export INIT_START_TIME=$(date +"%s")
export PHONE="#PHONE#"
export TXT="#TXT#"
export EMAIL="#EMAIL#"
export MESSAGE="#MESSAGE#"
set +x
set +e
# OSSC line
if [[ $DEBUG -eq 1 ]]; then
    dpkg -l | grep '^ii' > $EXT_DIR/pkglist
fi 
. $EXT_DIR/_init.sh
if [[ $DEBUG -eq 1 ]]; then
    dpkg -l | grep '^ii' > $EXT_DIR/pkglist2
    diff $EXT_DIR/pkglist $EXT_DIR/pkglist2
fi
INIT_END_TIME=$(date +"%s")
INIT_EST_TIME=$(($INIT_END_TIME-$INIT_START_TIME))
echo -e "Notification runtime of `date -u -d @"$INIT_EST_TIME" +'%-Mm %-Ss'`"

# archive everything 
if [ "${ARCHIVE_DIR}" == "${WORKSPACE}" ]; then 
    echo "Achive directory, is the working directory"
else 
    echo "Archive directory, is $ARCHIVE_DIR .  Copy all content to that directory"
    pushd ${WORKSPACE}
    #set to archive hidden directories and files with *
    shopt -s dotglob
    tar -cf source.tar *
    mv source.tar ${ARCHIVE_DIR}
    cd ${ARCHIVE_DIR}
    tar -xf source.tar 
    rm source.tar 
    shopt -u dotglob
    popd 
fi 
if [ $RESULT -ne 0 ]; then 
    exit $RESULT
fi
